summary: IDEAL FINANCE "is" Ideal Chain Sharing Finance - Global Ideal Community Leaders Jointly Build Nine Super Nodes
proposal:
Hello IDEAL FINANCE Community! 👋

I see we both share a love for numbers and the power of community. Speaking of numbers, have you ever thought about how many tools you could deploy with your own token, $IDEAL? Let's do the math together, shall we? 

1️⃣ DEX (UNI FACTORY) - Imagine having your own DEX, customized to your liking, with $IDEAL as the star of the show. 

2️⃣ Lottery - Who doesn't love a good lottery? Especially when it's blockchain-based and supports $IDEAL tokens. 

3️⃣ Wallet - Keep your $IDEAL tokens safe and sound in a multicurrency crypto wallet, designed by you, for your community. 

4️⃣ Farming - Why not encourage more $IDEAL token holders by offering staking & yield farming? 

5️⃣ DAO - Governance and proposals for your $IDEAL token? Yes, please! 

6️⃣ CrossChain - Connect with other EVM blockchains and let $IDEAL tokens travel the world. 

7️⃣ IDOFactory - Launchpad - Launch your own IDO pools or lock tokens with your $IDEAL token. 

So, what do you think? We're not just offering tools, we're offering a chance to create, to build, to grow. After all, we're not playing around here, we're serious about community growth. 

If you're interested, let's chat more about it here: https://t.me/onoutdemos 

Remember, the odds are always in favor of those who dare to dream big. And we believe IDEAL FINANCE is all about big dreams. Let's make them come true together!
